definition: Halifax (name)/Halifax city, capital of Nova Scotia, Canada/Halifax, town in West Yorkshire, England

sentences.english: At Halifax, straightway I took another liner. And this time for New York.
sentences.chinese: 在哈利法克斯我登上另一艘班船驶向纽约。

sentences.english: A shed stands in a field of lupine in Halifax.
sentences.chinese: 一间小屋位于哈利法克斯的一片原野上。
